name: Hamun Kost

personality.appearance: Red robes, shaved scalp, black necromantic tattoo on forehead
personality.mannerisms: Dismissive of interruptions, but willing to deal if mutually beneficial

background: Red Wizard of Thay (far east land). Tattooed flesh indicates school of magic (his = necromancy).
mission: Exploring Old Owl Well for arcane lore from Netheril builders. Has made progress.
tactics: Not aggressive unless provoked. Willing to negotiate and trade information.

deals.wyvern_tor: Wants orcs removed (they've scouted his camp). Will share info if party does this.
deals.agatha_question: Wants to ask Agatha: 'What is the name of the wizard who built the tower at Old Owl Well?' Too afraid to risk banshee's anger himself. Will trade info for asking.
deals.both: Can provide Cragmaw Castle location or Wave Echo Cave clues

tight_lipped: Won't reveal why he's really here
xp: 800 if defeated with zombies, 200 if parleys and reports back to Daran
